thread.title: Senior Treasury Analyst - Temporary Position Through Dec. 31, 2015 at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)
thread.title_full: Senior Treasury Analyst - Temporary Position Through Dec. 31, 2015 at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)

title: Senior Treasury Analyst - Temporary Position Through Dec. 31, 2015 at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)
text: Source: TreasuryJobs.com Kelly Services, Inc., a leading provider in workforce solutions, has an excellent opportunity for a Senior Treasury Analyst to work at their corporate headquarters, Troy, MI. This is a full time temporary assignment through Dec. 31, 2015 There may be flexibility on work hours in this temporary role, based on background and experience. The primary job function of this position is to support the Treasury function by performing strategic, tactical, and operational responsibilities including the following: - Forecasting interest income and expense on a global basis, as well as performing variance analysis on a monthly basis. - International cash management, ensuring forecasts are accurate and timely, and ensuring that international locations have sufficient capital to manage their business. - Interact with internal departments and banks to resolve issues/discrepancies. - Foreign exchange risk management - Ad hoc financial analysis - Data analysis with TM1 and other Kelly systems - Project work
